author: Tamara Izquierdo
title: Entramos en el espectacular ático que compartían Chiara Ferragni y Fedez durante su relación
text: Hace tan solo unos días, que salió a la luz la identidad de la amante de Fedez. El revuelo ha sido inmediato, ya que el artista mantuvo una relación paralela durante seis años, mientras convivía con Chiara Ferragni. En estos años, la influencer y el rapero se ha casado y han tenido dos niños , por lo que ha sorprendido que el rapero haya guardado este secreto durante tanto tiempo. Hasta el final de su relación, el matrimonio ha vivido con sus dos hijos en este fabuloso ático antes de mudarse a otra residencia en Milán. El afamado edificio de viviendas de lujo en Milán Vivieron muchos momentos inolvidables de su historia de amor en esta casa en la que la pareja residió varios años con sus hijos. Este piso se encuentra en CityLifeMilano, uno de los últimos proyecto que llevó a cabo la reputada arquitecta Zaha Hadid, famosa por sus diseños de líneas sinuosas y por redefinir conceptos estructurales y espaciales. Es una zona deseada y admirada de la ciudad, donde priman el lujo y la exclusividad. El edificio diseñado por Hadid es una propuesta voluptuosa y con muchas curvas, sello de identidad de la arquitecta conocida por su arquitectura fluida. CityLife Milano no solo es un lugar lujoso por su diseño vanguardista, sino también por los rostros conocidos que lo han elegido como vivienda. El proyecto de la famosa arquitecta anglo-iraquí se terminó en el año 2013 y cuenta con 7 edificios curvos de distintas alturas que van desde los 5 a los 13 pisos. El edificio, llamado Residenze Hadid , forma parte del complejo CityLife que conforma un conjunto de viviendas y oficinas donde las Tres Torres que se levantan en este espacio se han convertido en todo un símbolo reconocible de la ciudad y ha modificado sustancialmente su skyline . Ver esta publicación en Instagram Una publicación compartida de Chiara Ferragni ✨ (@chiaraferragni) Un complejo vanguardista muy cotizado Los apartamentos del edificio tienen vistas a la ciudad y se puede divisar il Duomo de Milán desde la terraza. Las vistas inmediatas tampoco son nada despreciables, ya que las viviendas dan a un parque lleno de zonas verdes, donde los pequeños podían disfrutar de su tiempo libre. En el exterior del edificio, Hadid utilizó materiales que visualmente sugieren movimiento como la fibra de cemento y la madera natural. Es un edificio peculiar y con un diseño de vanguardia que hacen de estas viviendas una residencia de lujo , elegantes y sofisticadas. No solo por fuera, es una vivienda que rezuma exclusividad , ya que a su interior no le falta detalle. Chiara Ferragni , Fedez y sus dos hijos, Leone y Vittoria, sin olvidarnos de la desaparecida (y famosa en redes) perrita Matilda, vivieron unos años muy felices en uno de los cotizados áticos del edificio . Hemos podido ver parte buena parte de la casa gracias a las redes sociales de la italiana donde, junto a su chico, ha hecho un house tour o se ha fotografiado con su expareja e hijos en diferentes zonas de la vivienda. Ver esta publicación en Instagram Una publicación compartida de Chiara Ferragni ✨ (@chiaraferragni) La casa de ensueño de The Ferragnez Nada más entrar en la vivienda de dos plantas vemos un imponente salón comedor muy espacioso y luminoso, con elementos de diseño como lámparas y con algún detalle kitsch y de la cultura pop. Escaleras voladas que llevaban a una zona donde Chiara tenía accesorios etc. y a rincón 'friki' de la casa con muñecos y figuras de películas de los 80 etc.; un sofá gigantesco en color gris, una mesa redonda en color dorado y una televisión encastrada en la pared junto con un potente equipo de sonido… un salón minimalista, pero con algunos toques modernos que le aportan personalidad y frescura. Una de las habitaciones fue destinada a ser un gimnasio para que tanto el cantante como la influencer pudieran mantenerse en forma sin salir de casa. Este espacio destaca por su luz natural. La terraza es inmensa y cuenta con mobiliario de exterior, muchas plantas, elementos de diseño como una escultura-silla de calavera, una de un oso verde, una con preciosos mosaicos y diseños geométricos que Fedez adora, flamencos y un telescopio para observar el cielo estrellado de Milán. Coronando las escaleras de madera de la terraza. Toques modernistas y tendencia minimalista Dentro de la casa, en el salón, Chiara nos enseñaba una lámpara con piel forma de escopeta dorada, una mesa de metacrilato llena de elementos retro de colores, y algunos objetos deco de Fedez. La cocina cuenta con una isla muy práctica y con unas vistas preciosas a la ciudad de Milán. La autora del blog The Blonde Salad enseña las habitaciones de sus hijos y su gusto por mantener todo en orden. Ver esta publicación en Instagram Una publicación compartida de Chiara Ferragni ✨ (@chiaraferragni) La pareja nos enseñaba su dormitorio en el vídeo y Chiara le da un toque de atención a Fedez por no haber hecho la cama antes de hacer el vídeo. La habitación es muy espaciosa y tiene un baño grande con bañera exenta. El vestidor de Fedez estaba pegado al dormitorio de la pareja y podemos ver muchas prendas y accesorios de su colaboración con la marca Supreme . Una vivienda fabulosa donde han pasado unos años de amor que han compartido a diario con sus millones de seguidores. Un lujo de casa que ya es solo un recuerdo de la historia de amor de una de las parejas más potentes del mundo de las redes sociales, por lo que su ruptura y posterior traición ha sorprendido al mundo.

author: sina_mobile
title: 视频让人不适！牛约堡后厨蟑螂横行，店员：繁衍太快！今年已开200家店，创始人曾称以外卖为主_手机新浪网
text:
视频让人不适！牛约堡后厨蟑螂横行，店员：繁衍太快！今年已开200家店，创始人曾称以外卖为主
每经编辑｜何小桃
7月2日，据福建电视台第一帮帮团报道，知名汉堡品牌牛约堡福建厦门有门店后厨，多种食材裸露，多只蟑螂到处爬行。
7月2日晚上，“厦门市场监管”公众号发布情况通报：
7月2日，媒体曝光了“牛约堡”食品安全问题，思明区和湖里区市场监管局立即行动，对“牛约堡”禾祥西店、林后店开展现场检查。执法人员重点对食品原料储存、加工制作环境等进行检查，对发现的食品安全相关违法行为当场立案。目前两家门店均已停止营业。同时，厦门市市场监管局对全市其他“牛约堡”门店开展全覆盖检查，深入排查食品安全风险隐患。不符合食品安全规范的门店均已暂停营业、自查整改。
下一步，市场监管部门将按照“四个最严”的要求，进一步开展案件调查，对危害食品安全的违法行为，坚决依法从快从严查处。感谢社会各界的监督！
值得注意的是，牛约堡近年扩张迅速，在全国拥有上千家门店，有产品号称“
麦当劳;)平替”，颇受市场欢迎。 )
后厨蟑螂横行
店员：“繁衍太快”
根据报道，牛约堡厦门林后店，外卖单量超2000单。记者探访后厨时注意到，满装着牛肉饼的铁桶就敞口放在地面上、面包胚裸露放在烤箱上晾晒，地面上不少蟑螂爬动。
) )
过道处的两箱未开封面包胚箱体标签显示，这批面包胚生产日期为2025年6月1日，标注“常温保质期10天”，而当日已为6月13日。
此外，牛约堡禾祥西路店也有类似情况，该门店在多个外卖平台月销量均超1000单，号称“堂食餐厅”，但记者在现场仅注意到一个极小的桌台和两张椅子。操作区汉堡烤台及设备表面油污和食物残渣遍布，部分区域污垢已凝结成块，冰箱内火腿、牛肉饼裸露未密封。罐头架上，四五只蟑螂在爬行，甚至装调料的碗中也有一只蟑螂。
)
对此，店员仅回应：“我知道，有做消杀，但蟑螂繁殖太快。”
) )
网友表示：
天塌了！正在吃
y茉莉：正在吃牛约堡，哭了。
芷若心仪：天塌了，最近经常点牛约堡。
人民的公仆：但是，牛约堡我是真的爱吃。
lucky小虹：以前很爱吃他们家凤梨堡，两年前路过一次线下门店，外面看着就很脏乱差，我就再也没点过。
城南的女疯纸：亲测牛约堡吃完直接肠胃炎上吐下泻。
蘑菇大盗_：太可怕了，这要严查。
)
创始人曾称以外卖为主堂食为辅
公开信息显示，牛约堡创立于2018年，主打手作牛肉汉堡，同时还有鸡肉、鱼肉和素食等各类汉堡以及炸鸡、薯条、小吃及饮品等。目前，牛约堡年销量超4700万个，全国155座城市拥有1800余家门店。
这次并不是牛约堡第一次被曝有食品卫生问题，据南方都市报去年9月报道，记者走访了广州4家牛约堡门店，发现基本以外卖为主，通常开在城中村的巷子里，一些门店环境比较简陋，卫生状况堪忧。
) )
此前，在黑猫投诉平台上也有多起关于牛约堡食品安全问题的投诉及相关的差评：“在外卖的炸鸡腿里吃到了生肉。”“吃完不到一个小时肚子疼，开始拉肚子”。
)
风波发酵后，牛约堡曾2024年9月5日发布数条
微博;)回应食品卫生问题。该品牌承认部分加盟店在管理和服务上存在不足，并表示已在改进。网络上对于其门店环境是食品卫生的指责大都来自于过去旧店和极个别情况，牛约堡正积极投入到老店的整改或迁址工作中，从最多时的400多家脏乱差到如今剩下60余家。 )
窄门餐眼显示，牛约堡的人均消费接近30元，略低于
肯德基;)、麦当劳，但比华莱士、塔斯汀等要贵上近10块。牛约堡推出的一款安格斯牛肉堡被称“麦当劳平替”，是最受欢迎的菜品之一。公开宣介资料显示，牛约堡4700万+牛肉汉堡的成绩，远超同类品牌30%以上；门店存活率远超行业均量，稳居汉堡加盟十大品牌第一梯队。
牛约堡在国内的加盟扩张之势的确迅猛，从2021年到2024年，牛约堡每年新开门店数量都超过300家。开年以来，牛约堡已在全国开出超200家门店。
)
加盟牛约堡门店是一门好生意吗？蓝鲸新闻记者致电牛约堡招商客服，工作人员表示，加盟合作费需要8.8万元，包含设备、员工培训等费用。因为目前加盟比较火热，培训已排至8月中旬。
一家牛约堡加盟的启动费用约20余万，回本周期大概在10-12个月，月盈利普遍在2-3万元。招商人员表示，牛约堡线下门店的毛利率一般在60-65%，比如售价21块的牛肉堡，成本可能在7.3元左右。线上方面则要结合不同外卖平台的扣点计算，毛利稍低一些。
)
牛约堡创始人王京海曾表示，在品牌创立的初期牛约堡的发展重心就一直放在外卖上，以外卖为主堂食为辅。招商人员透露，线上业务占比约80%。
编辑|何小桃 杜恒峰

author: CNET - Tyler Graham
title: Borderlands 4: Getting the Perfect Roll On Your Favorite Gun Might Be a Lot Harder | Flipboard
text:
Borderlands 4: Getting the Perfect Roll On Your Favorite Gun Might Be a Lot Harder Between the new weapon parts generation system and decreased legendary drop chances, you better strap in for a grind. The Borderlands State of Play stream made one thing abundantly clear: The next entry in the looter shooter series is redoubling its commitment to having more guns than ever …

author: Marzieh Rahmani
title: Al-Aqsa Storm Operation revives Palestinian cause: Hezbollah
text:
In a message to the "12th Conference of Gaza; Symbol of Resistance" which was held in Tehran on Saturday, Nasrallah said that the Operation made the world aware of the significance of the Palestinian cause which the foes had tried for years to consign into oblivion.
Al-Aqsa Storm Operation turned the threats into opportunities, he further noted.
He reiterated the importance of resistance, noting, “Those who suppose that the Ummah has an option other than resistance are completely wrong.”
Resistance is a key to victory when it comes to war in Gaza, he underscored.
The drops of blood shed in Lebanon, Syria, Iraq, Yemen, and Iran on the path of resistance have been in line with the sacrifices of fighters in the Gaza war, he pointed out.
This is called the unity of blood, weaponry, battlefields, and causes, he underlined.
Resorting to global organizations and the so-called international community has repeatedly proven futile, resulting only in regret, loss, failure, and bitterness.
Elsewhere in his message, he said that the normalization of relations with the Zionist regime has endangered the cause of Palestinians.
The families of the martyrs, military officials, and participants from the resistance front took part in the international event.
After more than three months of genocide in Gaza by the Zionist regime and the death of over 24,000 Palestinians, the European Parliament has finally issued a non-binding resolution in support of a “permanent ceasefire” in the besieged enclave.
MNA/PR

author: la rédaction avec AFP
title: Venezuela. Nicolás Maduro envoie des milliers de soldats à la frontière avec le Guyana
text: Venezuela Nicolás Maduro envoie des milliers de soldats à la frontière avec le Guyana Cette annonce intervient en pleine crise sur l’Essequibo, territoire riche en pétrole revendiqué par le Venezuela, après le déploiement d’un navire de patrouille militaire par le Royaume-Uni en soutien au Guyana. La tension monte encore entre le Venezuela et le Guyana. Le président vénézuélien a lancé ce jeudi des exercices militaires avec 5 600 soldats dans la zone frontalière du Guyana en « réponse à la provocation » du Royaume-Uni, qui a envoyé un navire de guerre au Guyana en pleine crise sur l'Essequibo. Un navire pour lutter contre le trafic de drogue « J'ai ordonné l'activation d'une action conjointe de toutes les Forces Armées nationales bolivariennes (vénézuéliennes) dans les Caraïbes orientales, sur la côte atlantique, une action conjointe de nature défensive, en réponse à la provocation et à la menace du Royaume-Uni contre la paix et la souveraineté de notre pays », a déclaré le président Nicolás Maduro, ce jeudi. Le HMS Trent a été envoyé début décembre dans les Caraïbes pour lutter contre les trafics de drogue. Il arrivera au Guyana vendredi et doit participer à des exercices militaires dans les eaux guyaniennes pendant « moins d'une semaine ». Il n'est pas prévu qu'il accoste à Georgetown, a souligné une source des Affaires étrangères guyanien. Dans un communiqué, le gouvernement vénézuélien avait « rejeté catégoriquement l'arrivée du navire (...) ce qui constitue un acte de provocation hostile ». « aucun plan » pour attaquer le Venezuela Contrairement à ce dont l'accuse le président vénézuélien Nicolas Maduro, le vice-président du Guyana, Bharrat Jagdeo, a assuré n'avoir « aucun plan pour prendre des mesures offensives contre le Venezuela (...) Nous n'avons pas l'intention d'envahir le Venezuela ». Il a précisé que l'arrivée d'un patrouilleur britannique dans les eaux du Guyana entrait dans le cadre « d'exercices de routine planifiés depuis longtemps ». L'Essequibo, territoire disputé La tension était montée après le lancement en septembre d'appels d'offres pétroliers par le Guyana, puis le référendum organisé en réaction le 3 décembre au Venezuela sur un rattachement de l'Essequibo, territoire de 160 000 km2 riche en pétrole et ressources naturelles, administré par Georgetown et revendiqué par le Venezuela. Quelque 125 000 personnes, soit un cinquième de la population du Guyana, vivent dans l'Essequibo, qui couvre les deux tiers de la superficie du pays. Le Venezuela soutient que le fleuve Essequibo doit être la frontière naturelle, comme en 1777 à l'époque de l'empire espagnol. Le Guyana argue que la frontière, datant de l'époque coloniale anglaise, a été entérinée en 1899 par une cour d'arbitrage à Paris.

author: Simply Wall St
title: Maccura Biotechnology Co.Ltd (SZSE:300463) Could Be Riskier Than It Looks
text:
China- /
Life Sciences- /
- SZSE:300463
Maccura Biotechnology Co.Ltd (SZSE:300463) Could Be Riskier Than It Looks
When close to half the companies in China have price-to-earnings ratios (or "P/E's") above 37x, you may consider Maccura Biotechnology Co.Ltd (SZSE:300463) as an attractive investment with its 24.8x P/E ratio. Although, it's not wise to just take the P/E at face value as there may be an explanation why it's limited.
Recent times haven't been advantageous for Maccura BiotechnologyLtd as its earnings have been falling quicker than most other companies. The P/E is probably low because investors think this poor earnings performance isn't going to improve at all. If you still like the company, you'd want its earnings trajectory to turn around before making any decisions. If not, then existing shareholders will probably struggle to get excited about the future direction of the share price.
 Check out our latest analysis for Maccura BiotechnologyLtd
free report on Maccura BiotechnologyLtdwill help you uncover what's on the horizon.
What Are Growth Metrics Telling Us About The Low P/E?
The only time you'd be truly comfortable seeing a P/E as low as Maccura BiotechnologyLtd's is when the company's growth is on track to lag the market.
Taking a look back first, the company's earnings per share growth last year wasn't something to get excited about as it posted a disappointing decline of 13%. As a result, earnings from three years ago have also fallen 71% overall. Accordingly, shareholders would have felt downbeat about the medium-term rates of earnings growth.
Turning to the outlook, the next year should generate growth of 57% as estimated by the three analysts watching the company. With the market only predicted to deliver 37%, the company is positioned for a stronger earnings result.
With this information, we find it odd that Maccura BiotechnologyLtd is trading at a P/E lower than the market. Apparently some shareholders are doubtful of the forecasts and have been accepting significantly lower selling prices.
The Key Takeaway
Typically, we'd caution against reading too much into price-to-earnings ratios when settling on investment decisions, though it can reveal plenty about what other market participants think about the company.
We've established that Maccura BiotechnologyLtd currently trades on a much lower than expected P/E since its forecast growth is higher than the wider market. When we see a strong earnings outlook with faster-than-market growth, we assume potential risks are what might be placing significant pressure on the P/E ratio. It appears many are indeed anticipating earnings instability, because these conditions should normally provide a boost to the share price.
Having said that, be aware Maccura BiotechnologyLtd is showing 1 warning sign in our investment analysis, you should know about.
If these risks are making you reconsider your opinion on Maccura BiotechnologyLtd, explore our interactive list of high quality stocks to get an idea of what else is out there.

author: APA
title: Azerbaijan celebrates Day of Khankandi, Khojaly, Khojavand, and Aghdara
text:
Home page Social 1 0 Azerbaijan celebrates Day of Khankandi, Khojaly, Khojavand, and Aghdara 20 September 2024 00:00 (UTC +04:00) September 20 is designated as Day of Khankendi, Khojaly, Khojavand, and Aghdara, APA reports.
According to an Order signed by President Ilham Aliyev on September 18, 2024, September 20 will be marked as the Day of Khankandi, Khojaly, Khojavand, and Aghdara.
On September 19, 2023, the local anti-terror measures were initiated in the region to ensure the implementation of the trilateral statement’s provisions, prevent large-scale provocations in the Garabagh economic region, disarm and remove Armenian armed forces from Azerbaijan’s territories, neutralize their military infrastructure, ensure the safety of the civilians returning to the liberated territories, as well as the civilian workers and military personnel involved in the reconstruction and rehabilitation works, and restore the constitutional order of the Republic of Azerbaijan.
On September 19, 2023, around 13:00, the commencement and successful completion of anti-terror measures resulted in Azerbaijan restoring its sovereignty.
On September 28, 2023, the so-called entity in the Garabagh region of Azerbaijan announced its dissolution, thereby ending the existence of the "Republic of Nagorno-Garabagh."
On October 15, 2023, President Ilham Aliyev hoisted the State Flag of the Republic of Azerbaijan in the cities of Aghdara, Khojavand, and Khojaly, in the Asgaran settlement of Khojaly, in the area of the Sarsang Reservoir, and in the city of Khankandi.
At least 3 dead, 22 injured in north Peru bus accident Geomagnetic storm expected to last until noon today Kremlin spokesman says Harris is more predictable than Trump Azerbaijan Ilham Aliyev Garabagh Khankandi Khojaly Khojavand Aghdara Armenia anti-terror measures

author: Philip Pullella
title: Pope visits female prison for foot-washing ritual
text:
Pope Francis has looked well as he washed and kissed the feet of 12 women prisoners in a traditional ritual on the first of four event-filled days leading to Easter for the 87-year-old pontiff.
Francis travelled to Rome's Rebibbia prison, in a run-down area on Rome's outskirts, to preside at a Holy Thursday Mass for dozens of inmates, guards, chaplains and officials gathered in an outdoor area of the female section.
From his wheelchair, he washed and kissed the right foot of 12 women sitting on a riser in a ritual commemorating Jesus' gesture of humility to his apostles at the Last Supper on the night before he was crucified.
A number of the inmates were foreigners and some cried as he performed the ritual.
The female section of the prison, one of Italy's largest, holds about 370 inmates.
Francis is the first pope to hold the foot-washing ceremony outside churches, usually in prisons, homes for the elderly or hospices, continuing a practice he began when he was archbishop of Buenos Aires.
He is also the first pope to include women, atheists, Muslims and other non-Christians in the service.
Previous pontiffs held the service in St Peter's Basilica in the Vatican or the Basilica of St John in Lateran and included only men, usually priests.
Francis wove his short, improvised homily around the theme of service to others.
"Each of you has their own story but the Lord listens to us with open arms and never tires of forgiving," he said.
Francis, who recently curtailed his speaking engagements because of fatigue related to bouts of bronchitis and influenza, seemed fit.
Francis also looked well and strong earlier on Thursday at a Mass in St Peter's Basilica, where he read a long homily and improvised part of it.
On Good Friday, the day Christians commemorate Jesus' crucifixion, Francis is due to preside at a "Passion of the Lord" service in St Peter's Basilica and then attend a traditional evening Via Crucis (Way of the Cross) procession at Rome's Colosseum.
He will preside at an Easter Vigil service on Saturday, and on Sunday will read his twice-annual "Urbi et Orbi" (to the city and world) message and blessing from the central balcony of St Peter's to tens of thousands of people in the square below.

author: Tom Quinn
title: Google: Legacy Tech and GenAI is Leaving UK Firms Vulnerable
text:
New research from Google suggests that IT and security leaders in the UK are feeling more pressure than their international counterparts, driven largely by the burden of legacy technology and the rapid rise of genAI threats.
\n The latest Google Workspace survey, Security at a tipping point , found that 75% of UK security leaders believe legacy technology has left them ill-equipped to handle the challenges of modern security threats, compared to 59% globally, creating vulnerabilities that cyber-criminals are more easily able to exploit.
\n The survey, from 2,000 business and security decision makers, highlights a persistent problem as organisations opt to expand existing tools rather than switching outdated ones for more modern, secure-by-design solutions, with 62% of security leaders admitting to reusing older security tools rather than replacing them.\xa0
\n Despite 96% of firms expressing high confidence in their ability to manage security, the fact is by relying on legacy systems, organisations are leaving themselves vulnerable, with complex and unwieldy security environments being more difficult to manage effectively.\xa0
\n Google\u2019s survey also showed that security leaders are increasingly wary of the threat posed by genAI, despite other business areas becoming reliant on AI tools. Over three-quarters (77%) of UK security executives believe that genAI threats have contributed to a rise in security incidents, underscoring the need for proactive measures to address the evolving security landscape.
\n Worryingly, most UK organisations have also been slow to act on these concerns, as only 27% of UK respondents said that they had introduced genAI-specific security policies, compared to the global average of 41%.\xa0
\n According to Google, the increase in security concerns related to AI can be attributed to several factors, including the rise of \u201cshadow AI\u201d inside of companies \u2013 the use of genAI tools that haven\u2019t been vetted or authorised by IT and security teams.
\n Almost two-thirds (63%) of decision makers reported that unlicensed genAI tools are being used on a weekly basis, despite less than half (44%) believing them to be safe.
\n Unsanctioned and ad hoc use of genAI creates a much more challenging environment for security administrators who are forced to protect against threats they can\u2019t see and can\u2019t measure, leading 63% to report that their organisation\u2019s technology landscape is less secure than it was in the past.
\n Those pressures have taken a toll on IT and security teams, with 43% of security leaders in the UK reporting that their teams are overwhelmed and burned out by security threats, 15% higher than the global average.\xa0
\n It\u2019s also impacting the bottom line, with the average cost of a data breach in the UK now \xa33.5 million, 7.6% higher than last year, with businesses reporting spending more cybersecurity insurance (37%), upgrading cyber defences (35%), renewing licences (34%), and finding new security providers (31%).\xa0\xa0
\n Despite snowballing costs, 60% of UK security leaders say they\u2019re open to new approaches that cost more to close the gaps in their defence.
\n \u201cDecision-makers are telling me they\u2019re worried and kept up at night,\u201d said Rachel Tobac, CEO of SocialProof Security .
\n \u201cTechnical tools aren\u2019t perfect, and they require a lot of human oversight, so decision makers are very stressed out. Teams need to audit their purchased tools to gain an understanding of which capabilities they already have before buying the same protection again and again.\u201d
\n
